# FPlayer-SwiftUI
Implementation of a SwiftUI music player with a mini player that supports both light and dark modes

## Screenshots

### Light Mode
<p align="center">
  <img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/58442234/337253271-cefee67f-6ed2-4c52-ba86-b51f59559f5b.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..-K2hmMGARKO-EXyONvH0v5XBu1mt2SZue6K_xm0TfdE" alt="Light Mode Mini Player" width="305"/>
  <img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/58442234/337253283-7806e5d0-9723-4e57-a6eb-536aa10ebeae.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..TP-sjr-FeeEvC7sIPYiY82hkJ9bqE-8frXRzyA0I69U" alt="Light Mode Fullscreen Player" width="305"/>
</p>
